name: IVFluidsRequiredForGrade3OrHigherDiarrhea
title: IV Fluids Required for Grade 3 or Higher Diarrhea
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set is intended to capture intravenous fluids which may be administered to patients with grade 3+ diarrhea.),(Data Element Scope: This value set would use the Medication QDM category.),(Inclusion Criteria: For the purposes of this value set, the following IV fluids are included: 
- NSS 
- D5W 
- D5NS 
- Lactated Ringers),(Exclusion Criteria: IV fluids other than those listed above have been excluded from this value set.)

contains.display: 500 ML glucose 50 MG/ML / sodium chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
1000 ML glucose 50 MG/ML / sodium chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
250 ML glucose 50 MG/ML / sodium chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
calcium chloride 0.2 MG/ML / potassium chloride 0.3 MG/ML / sodium chloride 6 MG/ML / sodium lactate 3.1 MG/ML Injectable Solution
